mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upms_app( app_id, app_name, description, app_type, app_key, app_secret, app_web_context_path, app_api_context_path, create_time, create_by ) VALUES ( #{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{appKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSecret, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appWebContextPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appApiContextPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy, jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM upms_app WHERE app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.app_id appId, a.app_name appName, a.description description, a.app_type appType, a.app_key appKey, a.app_secret appSecret, a.app_web_context_path appWebContextPath, a.app_api_context_path appApiContextPath, a.enabled enabled, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.create_by createBy FROM upms_app a WHERE a.app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.app_id appId, a.app_name appName, a.description description, a.app_type appType, a.app_key appKey, a.app_secret appSecret, a.app_web_context_path appWebContextPath, a.app_api_context_path appApiContextPath, a.enabled enabled, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.create_by createBy FROM upms_app a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.app_id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM upms_app a WHERE 1=1
